attacker.name: Raze
attacker.description: She has grenades on their waist. She is holding a rocket launcher amnd it looks like she won't leave without putting up a fight.

attacker.name: Sova
attacker.description: He has piercing blue eye. He has a bow, with three long range, enegry blasts. Looks like he isn't going anywhere without a fight.

attacker.name: Sage
attacker.description: She's behind a shining green glow, a spere illuminating above their body

attacker.name: Pheonix
attacker.description: He covers the room in flames you are in, you see him holding a ball of fire ready to throw.

attacker.name: Cypher
attacker.description: He has a wide brimmed hat with a menacing look with a mask covering his lower face.

attacker.name: Yoru
attacker.description: He has blue hair, and he's staring you down.

attacker.name: Killjoy
attacker.description: She's wearing a green hat with robots surrounding them.

attacker.name: Reyna
attacker.description: She emerges from thin air with a purple glow, her arms are coverd in purple fog and tatoos.

attacker.name: Viper
attacker.description: She comes out of a large green cloud emerges, with poison around her waist.

attacker.name: Breach
attacker.description: He's cyborg and he is comeing out of the walls, looking at you straight in the eyes.
